testcase.name: Check Cancel Button exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the Assigned Orders list..................................passed When the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed Then the user sees the "Order Details" screen...............................passed And the user sees the "Cancel" button.......................................passed

testcase.name: Check Successful Cancel Order
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user logs in the application........................................passed And the user sees the Assigned Orders list..................................passed When the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user sees the "Order Details" screen................................passed And the user clicks on the "Cancel" button..................................passed And the user clicks on the "YES Cancel Order" button........................passed Then the user sees that the clicked order item is not in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed
